This page provides information about the valid indicative distribution map for the ecosystem functional group [**M3.1 Continental and island slopes**](/efg-info/M3_1.qmd). For older or alternative maps, see [here](/map-info/M3_1_history.qmd).

## Methods

Here is the methods summary for **Map code and version**: M3.1.web.orig v1.0.

> Major occurrences of continental and island slopes was based on the ‘slope’ geomorphic unit of Harris et al. (2014b). Occurrences were converted to 30 arc second spatial resolution.

::: {.cell}

:::

## How to use the data

### Available files

:::{.aside}

Following maps are considered current and valid indicative distribution maps for this ecosystem functional group. `Web navigation` maps are optimised for use in webapps, but they have similar methods and differ only in details of format and processing. 

- Indicative Map (**code: M3.1.IM.orig**, version v1.0) 
 - Web navigation (**code: M3.1.web.orig**, version v1.0) 


:::

You can download geospatial data for this map from the following sources:

**M3.1.IM.orig** (v1.0): [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/M3.1.IM.orig_v1.0.tif){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3958934){target="gisdata"}

**M3.1.web.orig** (v1.0): [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/M3.1.web.orig_v1.0.tif){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090976){target="gisdata"} :: [GitHub repository](https://github.com/red-list-ecosystem/typology-map-data/blob/master/data/layers/M3.1.web.orig_v1.0_topo.json){target="gisdata"} :: [GitHub repository](layers/M3.1.web.orig_v1.0_topo.json){target="gisdata"} :: [GitHub repository](M3.1.web.orig_v1.0_topo.json){target="gisdata"} :: [Earth Engine assets](projects/earthengine-legacy/assets/users/jrferrerparis/IUCN-GET/L3_IndMaps/){target="gisdata"}
